mapper.select:
select s.sns_wrt_no , s.sns_title , s.sns_ctt , s.sns_write_date , s.sns_tag , s.sns_hit , m.name , s.mem_id
,( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM sns_like l where l.sns_wrt_no = s.sns_wrt_no ) as like_cnt
, (select like_no from sns_like l where l.sns_wrt_no = s.sns_wrt_no and mem_id = #{memId}) as like_no
from sns s
join mem m on s.mem_id = m.mem_id
order by s.sns_wrt_no desc

select a.attach_origin_name , a.attach_save_name , a.attach_path , a.attach_ext , a.attach_table_div , a.attach_table_pk FROM attach a JOIN SNS s ON a.attach_table_pk = s.sns_wrt_no WHERE a.attach_table_div= 's' AND s.sns_wrt_no = #{snsWrtNo}

select s.sns_wrt_no , s.sns_title , s.sns_ctt , s.sns_write_date , s.sns_tag , s.sns_hit , m.name , s.mem_id , g.grp_name , g.sns_grp_no ,( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM sns_like l where l.sns_wrt_no = s.sns_wrt_no ) as like_cnt from sns s left outer join sns_grp g on s.sns_grp_no = g.sns_grp_no join mem m on s.mem_id = m.mem_id where sns_wrt_no= #{snsWrtNo}
select sns_wrt_no , sns_title , sns_ctt , sns_write_date , sns_tag , mem_id , sns_grp_no from sns where sns_wrt_no = #{snsWrtNo} and mem_id = #{memId}

select s.sns_wrt_no , s.sns_title , s.sns_ctt , s.sns_write_date , s.sns_tag , s.sns_hit , m.name , s.mem_id , g.grp_name , g.sns_grp_no , g.grp_create_date from sns s join sns_grp g on s.sns_grp_no = g.sns_grp_no join mem m on s.mem_id = m.mem_id where s.mem_id = #{memId} and s.sns_grp_no = #{snsGrpNo} order by s.sns_write_date desc
select sns_grp_no ,s.grp_create_date ,s.post_num ,s.grp_name ,s.grp_edit_date ,s.mem_id ,m.name from sns_grp s, mem m where s.mem_id = m.mem_id and s.mem_id = #{memId} order by s.grp_create_date desc

select s.sns_wrt_no , s.sns_title , s.sns_ctt , s.sns_write_date , s.sns_tag , s.sns_hit , m.name , s.mem_id , s.sns_grp_no from sns s join mem m on s.mem_id = m.mem_id where s.mem_id = #{memId} and s.sns_grp_no is null
